Package ru.mirea.coursework.controllers

Class ItemsController

java.lang.Object
ru.mirea.coursework.controllers.ItemsController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/items")
public class ItemsController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles GET, POST, PUT, DELETE methods used to manipulate items.

  • Method Details

    • create

      @PostMapping public void create​(@RequestParam java.lang.String name, @RequestParam java.lang.String price, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> model)
      Creates a new item and saves it to itemRepository.
      Parameters:
      name - item name.
      price - item price.
      model - model.
      See Also:
      ItemRepository

    • sayHello

      @GetMapping("/hi") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String sayHello()
      Redirects user to the hello page.
      Returns:
      "hello".

    • read

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Item>> read()

      Gets all the items.

      Returns a ResponseEntity<> object of one of the following statuses:
      • OK: items gotten successfully.
      • NOT_FOUND: items not found.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<>(items, HttpStatus.OK) or ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND) object.

    • read

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Item> read​(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)

      Gets an item with its id.

      Returns a ResponseEntity<> object of one of the following statuses:
      • OK: item found successfully.
      • NOT_FOUND: item not found.
      Parameters:
      id - item id.
      Returns:
      new ResponseEntity<>(item, HttpStatus.OK) or ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND) object.

    • update

      @PutMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> update​(@PathVariable(name="id") int id, @RequestParam Item item)

      Updates an item.

      Returns a ResponseEntity<> object of one of the following statuses:
        *
      • OK: item updated successfully.
        • *
      • NOT_MODIFIED: item not found.
        • *
      Parameters:
      id - item id.
      item - item.
      Returns:
      new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.OK) or new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_MODIFIED).

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> delete​(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)

      Deletes an item found with its id.

      Returns a ResponseEntity<> object of one of the following statuses:
      • OK: item deleted successfully.
      • NOT_FOUND: item not deleted.
      Parameters:
      id - item id.
      Returns:
      new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.OK) or new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_MODIFIED) object.

    • sort

      @GetMapping("/sort") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> sort()

      Sorts items using the itemService.sort() method.

      Returns a ResponseEntity<> object of one of the following statuses:
      • OK: items sorted successfully.
      • NOT_MODIFIED: items not sorted.
      Returns:
      new ResponseEntity<>(sorted, HttpStatus.OK) or new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.NOT_MODIFIED) object.
